last_scene: Arthur 'Artie' Penhaligon's frustration with a stuck bag of chips led to a fatal confrontation with a vending machine in his office breakroom.
After attempting percussive maintenance and reaching into the machine's chute, he was struck by a massive electrical surge.
Artie died as his vision pixelated and the mundane world dissolved into darkness.
key_events: Artie fails to retrieve a bag of Zesty Ranch Glitch-O's from the Snack-Master 4000.
Artie performs 'Percussive Maintenance' on the machine to no avail.
Artie places his Leather Wallet on the machine's ledge to free his hands.
Artie reaches into the delivery chute and touches a loose internal wire.
A massive electrical surge fatally electrocutes Artie.
Artie's Leather Wallet falls to the floor as he collapses.
The mundane world pixelates and dissolves into blackness as Artie dies.
